articles.author: THOMAS ADAMSON
articles.title: Sidelined by Trump, Macron tries to rally Europe on Ukraine. But divisions run deep - The Associated Press
articles.description: European leaders were summoned by French President Emmanuel Macron in a high-profile display of European coordination on Ukraine. But even as the French leader hosted heads of state in Paris, presenting himself as Europe’s de facto leader, deep divisions lurk…
articles.content: PARIS (AP) French President Emmanuel Macron painted a veneer of European unity by inviting a small number of handpicked European leaders to the Élysée Palace, while the Trump administration sidelined… [+5232 chars]
